data.title: Puccini by Unknown: (1954) Art / Print / Poster
data.meta_description: Paper, offset lithography. - 1954 - Size: B2 (cca. 50 x 70 cm). Puccini is a 1954 vintage Hungarian movie poster advertising a 1953 Italian film Puccini is a 1953 Italian drama film directed by Carmine Gallone It stars actor Gabriele Ferzetti in the role of Giacomo Puccini source wikipedia org Produced in Italy in breathtaking Technicolor this biographical story of Puccini played by L avventura s Gabriele Ferzetti spans his creative life from early student days to the height of success including his early flop Madama Butterfly and his incomplete Turandot Along the way he encounters three women who change his life including a sexy beautiful singer Two for the Road s Nadia Gray whom he drops for a small town girl Sirocco s Marta Toren and a servant girl who commits suicide over him Well selected excerpts from Manon La Boheme Madama Butterfly and Turandot are featured along with other Puccini music including the voice of Beniamino Gigli Sets costumes and production values are first class all sumptuously filmed by Claude Renoir Director Carmine Gallone Writers Leonardo Benvenuti story and screenplay Carmine Gallone story and screenplay Stars Gabriele Ferzetti M rta Tor n Nadia Gray source imdb com Fine, light fold marks and wear, small holes. - Puccini
data.text:
Terms of Sale:

Welcome to our website! Here are a few frequently asked questions about our inventory and ordering. If you have any questions, please let us know!

How can I buy a poster or other items listed on the website?

The best way to order from us is to send an e-mail to info@budapestposter.com. We will contact you shortly, and provide all necessary information about the posters you wish to buy as well as the details of the purchase and the delivery.

Another way to purchase from us is personally, in the g...

More Information

Shipping Terms:

Shipping & handling

When you decide which poster you would like to purchase, contact us by e-mail to discuss every related details, including shipping. We ship the item(s) by FedEx International Priority Shipping.

Shipping costs 20-30 USD for small items shipped in Fedex Paks and 30-40 USD for posters packed in tubes and Fedex triangle tubes.

Insurance is optional and commands an extra fee.

Some orders might need special packaging, insurance or other to fulfill which might result in higher shipping costs.

After receiving full payment, we ship the item(s) in 2 business day in most cases. If shipping takes most time for some unexpected reason, we will contact you and will keep you updated.

The posters are carefully packed and shipped in protective paper sheets then put in round tubes then placed in triangle-shaped tubes provided by FedEx, and then closed by adhesive tape.
